entry.title: LES SUÊTES WIND WARNING , Grand Étang
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Étang 07:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -7.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow or ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning then changing to ice pellets or freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 110 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain changing to flurries near midnight. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 110 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
